referenceObject.reference: Wermelinger-Moreira, G., Pedroso, D. R., Castanheira, P. de S. & Baptista, R. L. C. (2024a). A new genus of lyrate curtain-web spiders (Araneae: Mygalomorphae: Dipluridae) from southeastern Brazil, with two new species and revalidation of a formerly described species.
